notFoundText: Whatever you were looking for, it's not here.
serverErrorText: The system is down. I dunno what you did, moron, but you sure screwed everything up good.

firstRun.authError: This Tapir server is not configured!
firstRun.authErrorText: To configure the server, open the URL displayed on the console where you started this Tapir server.
firstRun.heading: Set up your Tapir server
firstRun.domainHint: The domain name this instance will be served from.
firstRun.urlHint: The full URL of the instance. Usually this is https://[domain], unless you're doing something unusual like serving unencrypted HTTP.
firstRun.portHint: The port that Tapir will serve HTTP on. (Tapir cannot serve HTTPS on its own! Use a reverse proxy for that!) If Tapir is behind a reverse proxy, this is the port the proxy will connect to.
firstRun.adminEmailHint: An email address for the administrator of this site. The Mastodon API requires this.
firstRun.displayNameHint: The name of the instance. Displayed in the sidebar and the page title.
firstRun.summaryHint: A short blurb describing the instance. Displayed on the homepage and in the sidebar.
firstRun.loginHint: Tapir is a single-user server, so there will only ever be one login account. Your login name is not visible to anyone else.
firstRun.storageHint: If you don't know what the options in this section mean, it's safe to use the default settings.
firstRun.dataDirHint: The directory containing all of Tapir's local filesystem data. If you change this from the default, Deno may need new permissions to access the new directory!
firstRun.remoteDatabaseMaxObjectsHint: The maximum number of objects (posts) that can be stored in the remote database before garbage collection occurs. Set to 0 for unlimited size.
firstRun.remoteRepoMaxSizeMBHint: The maximum amount of data, in megabytes, that can be stored in the remote media store before garbage collection occurs. Set to 0 for unlimited size.
firstRun.mainPersonaHint: A Tapir instance has multiple followable "users" called Personas, all owned by you. The Main Persona is the only one that can follow other users.
